1.title: Pilot
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Dysmorphia
2.plot: Now weeks into Sharon's partnership, Luis is still struggling with what it means to be relevant. After running into his frenemy, the lovable Marco and his hot bod, Luis faces his own body issues when Sharon and Lucia ask him to do the unthinkable: strip down for social media. Miss Chicharron isn't the only piece of meat.

3.title: Camino De Belen
3.plot: After a divine passenger gets into Sharon's Prius, she is convinced it's a Christmas miracle and proceeds to drag Luis into wild search for the perfect Miss Chicharron Christmas picture. And as odd coincidences bring Marco and Lucia into the mix, the group tries to hold everything together as everything starts falling apart. Finding Bethlehem in East LA was never going to be easy.

4.title: Amal Clooney
4.plot: So as it turns out, a Christmas picture wasn't the best idea. Luis and Sharon find themselves at the center of a backlash, something neither of them is prepared for. After Lucia tears them apart, Sharon comes up with a plan that will get Miss Chicharron back on the A-list: they get a selfie with a legit, socially-responsible celeb. And who just happens to be in town? Amal Clooney, the First Lady of the UN herself.

5.title: Zero Dark Piggy
5.plot: With Miss Chicharron now in the clutches of the internet wannabe pretending to be Amal Clooney, Sharon and Luis enlist Lucia and Marco to help track down the mysterious Anal Cloompsky (that's Anal with a soft vowel, thanks) so they can bring home the bacon. And when Sharon once again loses her cool and exposes their plan, the group comes face to face with the woman that could either ruin or rescue them all. Has all this work been for nothing?

imdb.plot outline: Luis Cardoza is an actor that hasn't booked anything since the Brittney Spears debacle of 2007. As a final attempt to salvage his flailing career, he attends a networking seminar that quickly lays out his problem: he doesn't use social media. He's paired up with Sharon Woods, a ghostwriter for internet phenomenon Miss Chicharron, a stuffed pig. The plan is simple: get exposed, get famous, get relevant. Two unlikely warriors on a ruthless battlefield of hashtags and likes. No more wasting away in the real world, the inter-webs are calling- time to wake up and smell the bacon.
imdb.title: Relevant
